# groupTouchBar

**Instance Property**

A bar that holds this group’s items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var groupTouchBar: NSTouchBar { get set }
```

## Discussion

This bar can be configured in the same way as all other bars.

By default, this bar is empty.

## Configuring groups

- **groupUserInterfaceLayoutDirection**: The user interface direction that controls the layout order of the items.
